content: hello!Ballet has provided me with 20 wallets from the CFC Conference in St. Moritz Switzerland that occurred January 11th to 13th - these will not be sold online in the Ballet Store.Please list you name and qty desiredexample: MoparMiningLLC - 2cost: $35 ea shipping: there is no charge for the shipment to me, shipment to you depends on qty, location and carrier preference. Can also be consolidated with minerjones or myself.I have been allotted 20 guaranteed. If we go over that, please hold pymt until I confirm I can get additional.Accepted forms of payment:BTC: 1FGTHoXtr6X9PVm5qJpa9DbdZFpAGLAa8G or bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4esStrike: strike.me/moparminingllcLightning: let me know and I will send you an LN invoicePlease note: I cannot take CASHAPP, VENMO or PayPal any longer. If you wish to pay with fiat, I suggest signing up for Strike - let me know and I can send you a referral code as well (I think you get $5 for using it)
